name: Introduction to Python Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming language, including basic syntax, data types, and control structures.

name: Web Development with JavaScript
description: Explore the world of web development using JavaScript. Cover topics such as DOM manipulation, AJAX, and frameworks like React.

name: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Dive into the basics of machine learning, including regression, classification, and clustering algorithms.

name: Graphic Design Essentials
description: Master the essential principles and techniques of graphic design, including typography, color theory, and layout design.

name: Digital Marketing Strategies
description: Learn how to develop effective digital marketing strategies, including SEO, social media marketing, and email campaigns.

name: Introduction to Data Science
description: Discover the fundamentals of data science, including data wrangling, exploratory data analysis, and data visualization.

name: iOS App Development
description: Build your own iOS apps from scratch using Swift programming language and Apple's Xcode development environment.

name: Introduction to Cybersecurity
description: Understand the basics of cybersecurity, including network security, cryptography, and security protocols.

name: Business Management Fundamentals
description: Learn essential concepts of business management, including strategic planning, marketing, and finance.
